page.title: 18Molinginish, Harris
page.content: Also included in this block is the deserted village of{Molinginish.}This village is on the north side of Loch Trollamarig and nobody has lived here for quite some time. There are some houses left but only one with a roof on. Again there is no road to this place but an access path branches off the Tarbert to Rhenigidale path. The walk from Tarbert to Molinginish is a shorter distance but the croftland supported less families than at Rhenigidale. If the weather is calm it is possible to go across from Rhenigidale in a small boat and walk to Tarbert from there. Thus making the journey shorter and easier.
